name: droneWorld
description:
droneWorld is the prototype of an upcoming multiplayer game.

This is an early work in progress, your feedback is welcome!

Controls: WASD + mouse + left and right clicks for gun/missile

Play it on https://lab.openbloc.fr/droneWorld to get the latest version.
You can follow me on twitter at https://twitter.com/maxmre to get more updates!
